Los Angeless DOT NET Geek Dinner

The LA .NET Geek Dinners are a monthly gathering of Microsoft Geeks in Los Angeles. The dinners are for Anyone who has an interest in Microsoft Technologies, Coding, The Internet, Technology, Databases, Software Design, Testing, Servers, Networking, anything .Net or you just know you're a geek is welcome.
